title: Billy Corgan‘s Adventures in Carnyland
overview: Billy Corgan's Adventures in Carnyland, a new, 8-episode unscripted series streaming only on The CW, drops the curtain for a look at how Corgan balances life as the driving force behind rock icons The Smashing Pumpkins (Pumpkinworld) with work as a wrestling promoter and owner of the National Wrestling Alliance (Carnyland) while being a dedicated father in the midst of planning an epic wedding to his longtime love, Chloé Mendel.
